page.title: 04ATTITUDES FORRES WEST
page.content: {Police}Some people think that the police do a good job and other 50% think that they don't.The Forres police have enough manpower to cope with any trouble in the town. {Religion}There are many types of religion in Forres such as Protestants,Catholics and Jehovah's Witnesses.There is a mixed opinion on religion with some not bothered about it while others ,Church goers ,entusiastic. {Shopping}In Forres there is an old scrapyard which seems destined to become the syte for a new Finefare supermarket.At present there is a major public debate over whether this should go ahead.
